title: i know I've used my 3 refund tokens but i beg of you to refund sgu for me.
body: please riot, it was the biggest waste of rp spent and i would be incredibly grateful if you could refund it for me :)

replies.body:
Spirit Guard Udyr? That's an Ultimate skin isn't it?

And costly. I would research something like that a bit more before buying it myself, to be honest. If you bring this up with a red then they'll just tell you, "Should have saved your refund tokens, bud."
i bought it ages ago. i havnt used it once

Oh.

Well, do you really need the rp back then?

Hm.

What can I say? It's something you brought ages ago, which has materially lost its value due to you being able to use it. I'm extremely doubtful you'll be able to get your money back, as Riot can just say, "We don't let players hire skins."
